What Is AOL Email?

Step 2: Fill in the required fields with your personal information.
Step 3: Choose your preferred username and password and click on the “Next” button.
Step 4: Select your desired security questions and answers, then click on the “Next” button.

AOL Mail app download is available on the App Store and Google Play Store.

Step 1: Go to the App Store or Google Play Store and search for “AOL Mail.”

Follow the steps below to set up email forwarding in AOL Mail.
Step 1: Open your AOL Mail account and click on the “Settings” icon.
